ðŸ“– Summary: Quicky CLI is a tool designed to simplify the deployment and management of self-hosted Next.js and Node.js applications. It offers features such as GitHub integration, automated process management with PM2, domain and SSL configuration, webhook management, and a dashboard for monitoring, aiming to streamline the entire application lifecycle on remote servers.
